api_data.job_title: Urgent Opening for Tours & Travel Company, Location- Bangalore,Hyderabad

jd_information.description: Talent Hunters Hiring for Tours and Travel company(MNC) : Profile 1:Customised Tours(FIT) SpecialistLocations:-Vijayawada(AP & Telengana), Saifabad(Hyderabad),Jayanagar-BangaloreVacancies:-1 vacancy in each of the locationsDept:- Franchisee Exposure :-Should have experience in Customised Tours Sales for destinations like US, Europe, Australia, NZ, South Africa, Dubai, Far East.Communication skills:-Good communication skills with mandatory knowledge in English & local languageExperience(in years):-Minimum 2-5 yearsSalary(CTC):-Sahakar Nagar-4.5lpa,Jayanagar & Saifabad-5.0lpa.Vijayawada-4.3lpaNotice Period:-Immediate joinees preferred, if not then max. upto 1 month   if interested you can send me your CV for this E-mail ID-hr.thms123@gmail.com/singhpink924@gmail.com OR you can call me on this Numbers -9867311024/9168920073.Thanks & RegardsPinky9867311024
